Author: Det
Name: Auto Hook
Description: It hooks the fish for you, can you believe it?
Changelog:
- Presets for custom baits added, you can now swap configs without needing to recreate it every time
- Added an option to only cast Chum when under the effect of Fisher's Intuition
- Added an option to only cast Prize Catch when Mooch II is not available, saving you 100gp if all you want is to mooch
-Upgrade to .net7 and API8

-- Small changes --
- Adjustments to the UI
- A lot of code refactor
- Some bugfixes

Author: Det
Name: Minion Roulette
Punchline: Swap between your minions every time you change zones
Description: Make sure to enable the checkbox in the Minion Guide if you want only your favorite minions to be swapped
Changelog: Disabled on Island Sanctuary, since it removed minions placed there
